DOC.brief_summary: Insomnia highly prevalent , often debilitate , economically burdensome condition . Reviews literature indicate ethnic difference sleep behavior , African Americans objectively subjectively report disorder sleep Caucasian Americans.Chronic insomnia significant impact mental physical health outcome associate impaired cognitive performance , particularly , area speed , attention , work memory , executive function . In order understand brain mechanisms sleep disorder rest state well cognitive processing , investigator assess rest state EEG ( eyes-closed eyes-open condition ) well ERP task assess decision-making reward processing . The primary objective study evaluate effect tailor , telephone-delivered cognitive behavioral intervention , versus self- monitoring control condition , symptom insomnia neurodynamic correlate . Hypotheses : Among Blacks subjectively report symptom insomnia , randomize tailor , telephone-delivered CBT-I , compare randomized self-monitoring control group , : Hyp . 1 : Greater reduction symptom insomnia measure Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index . Hyp . 2 : Greater neurophysiologic improvement ( ERP , ERO ) intervention condition response laboratory paradigm Hyp 3 : Greater improvement psychosocial function include reduction depression increase quality life .
DOC.brief_title: Electrophysiologic Changes Blacks Treated With CBT Insomnia
